author: jstrachan
msg: A new test case to try out the use of Ant Paths from inside a Jelly Tag.
This also includes the patch to make this work! :-)
Also included a JellySwing test case to ensure it keeps working

author: jstrachan
msg: minor patch to make the Logger a static final variable to avoid looking it up each time a new context is made

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a simple <jms:onMessage> tag which allows Jelly scripts to be used to script incoming JMS messages.
This allows Jelly to be used as a simple, declarative scripting engine for processing JMS messages.

author: vmassol
msg: removed unused imports and some javadoc errors
